text: Jung Jong-Kwan (; 9 September 1981 – 30 May 2011) was a South Korean footballer. He was involved in the 2011 South Korean football betting scandal. He was found dead of a suspected by hanging himself at his hotel room in Seoul. ==References== == External links == * Category:1981 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Association football midfielders Category:South Korean footballers Category:Jeonbuk Hyundai Motors FC players Category:K League 1 players Category:K3 League players Category:People from Changwon Category:Soongsil University alumni Category:Suicides by hanging in South Korea Category:Association football players who committed suicide Category:Suicide in 2011
title: Jung Jong-kwan
